description:
Keroro takes inspiration from "The Emperor`s New Clothes" to create a gun that is invisible to idiots! Later, Natsumi and Saburo are the only members of the school`s new Invasion Club, but why are Keroro and the platoon hunting them down during lunch period?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Naked Invasion / Natsumi & Saburo, Launch Break of the Skies
ケロロ 裸の侵略者 であります/夏美&サブロー 昼休みの空 であります
